content.prompt: Which of the following best supports the conclusion that Japan borrowed extensively from Tang and Song China?

choices.label: Japan had established a decentralized power structure under a shogun by the eleventh century C.E.
Warriors or samurai gained substantial power and social status in Japan.
Societal relations in Japan were based on Confucian principles of hierarchy.
The Shinto religion continued to exert a strong influence on Japanese culture.

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450
